context: Figma became the leading collaborative design tool by 2020, surpassing Sketch in popularity. The pandemic accelerated adoption as remote teams needed real-time collaboration. FigJam launched for whiteboarding.

competitors.name: Sketch
competitors.notes: Mac design tool losing market share to Figma's collaboration features

competitors.notes: Adobe's UI/UX design tool competing directly with Figma

competitors.notes: Prototyping platform with DSM and Freehand collaboration
